name: Robo astronauts vs Amonguys
description:
Robo astronauts vs Amonguys is a game created for the GameOff 2020 jam.

The game really was conceived as a 2d roguelike in a lunar station. Somehow the game turnout to be a third person shooter. It was made in +15 days.
The 3d models of the rocks, spaceship, buildings, fences and platforms were made by Kenney.

Software used:

  • Unity3d
  • Blender
  • Photosopea
  • Krita
  • Inskape

Finally if you want to check the code it's here
